roleset.name: extreme, causing outrage (or other extreme feeling)

role.descr: entity finding arg0 to be outrageous

example.name: both args, empty it
example.text: The Garrisonians had usually found more support in Scotland and it was outrageous to them that Pennington should be poaching on their territory.
example.arg: that Pennington should be poaching their territory

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on WSJ data, outrage-v.01.
